New Records: Bronny James and LeBron James became the first father-son duo to share the floor in an NBA game
Key Match Events: Anthony Davis had a dominant performance with 36 points, 16 rebounds, 4 assists and 3 blocks
Jaxson Hayes had a poster dunk
LeBron James' layup put the Lakers up eight
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted a close game between the Lakers and Timberwolves
Post-Match Reflections: Chris Finch said 'We didn't answer the bell' after the loss
JJ Redick said 'I thought overall, our guys really did a phenomenal job of executing our game plan'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers have a back-to-back on Friday and Saturday
The Timberwolves travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Thursday
Anthony Edwards led Minnesota in scoring with 27 points on 10-25 shooting
